trans-unit.source: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.
trans-unit.target: Содержит сведения о событии, которое возникает при закрытии окна.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to window-closed events, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, specifying <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a WindowClosedEventArgs parameter.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы подписаться на события закрытия окна, вызовите <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, указав <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent>в `eventId` параметр и предоставление [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] обработчика событий, который принимает параметр WindowClosedEventArgs.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Когда приложение получает событие закрытия окна `sender` параметр обработчика событий не может использоваться для получения сведений о окна, которая была закрыта, поскольку соответствующий [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] элемент больше не является допустимым.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.
Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Извлекает [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] среды выполнения [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] связанных с этим событием.

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Когда приложение получает событие закрытия окна `sender` параметр обработчика событий не может использоваться для получения сведений о окна, которая была закрыта, поскольку соответствующий [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] элемент больше не является допустимым.

trans-unit.source: Use GetRuntimeId to match the window with a known identifier.
trans-unit.target: Используйте GetRuntimeId для соответствия окну с известным идентификатором.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the window on which the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] Среды выполнения [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] окна, на котором было создано событие.
